response.overview: Millie Jackson stars in this risqu√© comedy that outlines the extreme possibilities in the life of a determined woman. It all begins with her determination to marry a no-good, two-timing, dog of a man. It has yet to be determined if this was an accomplishment. He made her so depressed that she ate a herd cattle and two turkey farms. She lost the weight. She lost her husband and her mind.  She then seduces her nerdy psychiatrist, transforms him into a superfine bachelor and reclaims her life. The way she does it, from beginning to end (and all between), is non-stop, belly-aching hilarious!
response.title: Young Man, Older Woman
